abstract.p: Fred Lapides letter on Jeffrey Rosen's April 30 article on Internet privacy notes he visited adult Web site depicted on cover; photo

block.p: You depict on your cover an e-mail note that gives the address nastygirls.com as a site that ''Dave'' has been viewing late at night.

Naturally curious, I looked up the site. Sure enough, Dave had visited an adult site that -- good for Dave -- presumably shows sex pictures of mature women rather than specializing in very young girls. Aside from a few free peeks, though, you must be a member in order to spend any length of time at this site. I would have joined but, short on money, I decided to keep my subscription to The Times instead.
